name: Dee.ie
whoWeDo: I joined the team as a frontend freelancer developer, leveraging HTML5, JavaScript (with an emphasis on DOM manipulation), and TailwindCSS.
I have worked on a variety of projects, focusing on enhancing user experience and interface design.
Through my contributions, I have made a significant impact by optimizing page loading times, resulting in a 25% boost in website traffic and a 40% improvement in website performance metrics.

name: EnAccess
whoWeDo: I joined the team with the goal of enhancing software delivery efficiency and embarked on implementing CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker
I have played a crucial role in transitioning the company's legacy systems to a cloud-based infrastructure with DigitalOcean, aiming to boost scalability, reliability, and security
I have made a substantial impact, contributing to a 20% increase in customer satisfaction, a 30% improvement in system performance, and a 20% reduction in operational costs.

name: Wastezon X
whoWeDo: I joined as the frontend developer for Wastezon X, leveraging ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, and Redux to design a responsive and intuitive B2B application.

I have worked on achieving pixel-perfect fidelity across diverse devices, in collaboration with backend developers to ensure seamless API and database integrations for fluid data exchange and robust functionality.
I have made a significant impact by optimizing the application's performance, achieving a 40% improvement in response times.
